mobileJoin.title: Join YÃ¼ksi Mobile
mobileJoin.description1: With YÃ¼ksi, transporting any load, with any vehicle, to anywhere is now at your fingertips! Whether it's a small package or a massive load; from motorcycles to trucks, every type of vehicle is waiting for you at YÃ¼ksi.
mobileJoin.description2: The app matches you with the most suitable carrier within seconds thanks to its smart location-based system. This way, you save time and avoid unnecessary expenses.
mobileJoin.description3: Moreover, everything is transparent and clear with kilometer-based pricing! With YÃ¼ksi, transportation is no longer a hassle, but an enjoyable experience. You prepare your load, we'll connect you with the right vehicle and reliable carrier.
mobileJoin.description: Easily manage your transportation operations with the YÃ¼ksi mobile app.

A sustainable income model awaits you with a transparent payment system, timely payment guarantee and YÃ¼ksi's corporate assurance. Apply now and join our professional team.

hero.title: TURKEY'S LOGISTICS INFRASTRUCTURE PROVIDER
hero.description: As YÃ¼ksi, our vision is to be a pioneering brand that simplifies the lives of both individuals and businesses with our innovative and reliable service approach in the logistics sector, maximizing speed and efficiency with digital solutions. By focusing on technology, we want to safely deliver shipments of any scale our customers need, grow with sustainability principles, and become the preferred logistics solution partner in both Turkey and international markets.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description: YÃ¼ksi is a digital platform developed to offer innovative solutions to the logistics and transportation industry. Through the YÃ¼ksi mobile application, we bring shippers and carriers together in a secure, fast, and efficient way.

smartMatching.title: Smart Matching:
smartMatching.description: Thanks to our advanced algorithms, loads are matched with the most suitable carriers within seconds.

realTimeTracking.title: Real-Time Tracking:
realTimeTracking.description: You can track vehicle locations in real-time throughout the shipment process.

certifiedNetwork.title: Certified Carrier Network:
certifiedNetwork.description: All our carriers are part of an approved network that meets the required documents and qualifications.

flexiblePayment.title: Flexible Payment Solutions:
flexiblePayment.description: Payments are processed quickly and smoothly with our secure payment infrastructure.

timeCost.title: Time and Cost Savings:
timeCost.description: Accurate matching eliminates unnecessary waiting and empty hauls.

transparency.title: Transparency and Trust:
transparency.description: Every transaction is digitally recorded, increasing trust between parties.

support.title: 24/7 Support:
support.description: Our support team is always available to assist you with operational issues.

locationBased.title: Location-Based Smart System:
locationBased.description: Instantly identifies the nearest and most suitable carriers.

aiPlanning.title: AI-Powered Planning:
aiPlanning.description: Optimal transportation plans are created based on traffic, weather, and route data.

cloudBased.title: Cloud-Based Architecture:
cloudBased.description: All operations run smoothly with our secure, fast, and scalable infrastructure.

seo.title: About Us | YÃ¼ksi - Turkey's Logistics Platform
seo.description: Learn about YÃ¼ksi. Our vision as Turkey's innovative logistics platform, our services, and technological infrastructure.

seo.title: Our Services - YÃ¼ksi
seo.description: YÃ¼ksi services: Motorcycle courier (40-50 kg), Minivan (500-800 kg), Panel Van (1,000-1,500 kg), Pickup (1,500-3,500 kg), Truck (3,500-20,000 kg). Urban and intercity transportation solutions.

hero.title: YOUR LOAD IS OUR BUSINESS
hero.description: YÃ¼ksi offers fast and flexible solutions for your modern logistics needs. Whether from our mobile app or website, you can easily call a vehicle and safely transport your shipments with our wide fleet ranging from motorcycle couriers to minivans, panel vans, pickup trucks and trucks. YÃ¼ksi is always by your side for fast, practical and reliable service.

motorcycle.title: Motorcycle
motorcycle.description:
Motorcycle couriers can generally carry loads up to 40-50 kg. Whether it's just an envelope, a grocery bag or packaged food, everything is delivered safely.

From food orders to shopping items, from medicine to documents, motorcycle couriers are the most practical solution for quick delivery in the city.

minivan.title: Minivan
minivan.description:
Minivans can generally carry loads up to 500-800 kg. Whether it's a few boxes, small household items or bulk shopping items, everything fits comfortably.

From moving to office needs, from market delivery to small transportation, minivans offer practical and safe solutions for urban transport.

panelvan.title: Panel Van
panelvan.description:
Panel vans can generally carry loads up to 1,000-1,500 kg. Whether it's large boxes, furniture or bulk order products, everything is easily transported with their large volumes.

From home moving to store shipping, from e-commerce delivery to professional transportation, panel vans are a safe and powerful solution.

pickup.title: Pickup Truck
pickup.description:
Pickup trucks can generally carry loads up to 1,500-3,500 kg. Whether it's construction materials, large furniture or bulk commercial products, they are easily transported thanks to their strong structures.

From transportation to commercial shipping, from market and store delivery to agricultural products, pickup trucks offer reliable solutions for both urban and intercity transport.

truck.title: Truck
truck.description:
Trucks can generally carry loads starting from 3,500 kg up to 20,000 kg. Whether it's heavy machinery, large volume items or bulk commercial products, they are easily transported thanks to their large cargo area and powerful engines.

From intercity transportation to logistics shipping, from construction materials to industrial products, trucks offer safe and high-capacity solutions.
